parentDataList.nodeContext: Flux.interval(Duration.ofMillis(updateInterval)).doOnSubscribe(subscription -> log.debug("Scheduled status update every {}ms",updateInterval)).log(log.getName(),Level.FINEST).subscribeOn(Schedulers.newSingle("status-monitor")).flatMap((i) -> this.updateStatusForAllApplications()).retryWhen(Retry.any().retryMax(Integer.MAX_VALUE).doOnRetry(ctx -> log.error("Resubscribing after uncaught error",ctx.exception())))
